general.headline: Solutions Architect, Software Architect and developer
general.school: Sikkim Manipal University of Health, Medical and Technological Sciences
general.description:
Solutions designer, Developer and Solutions Architect with over 15 years of Experience. He has extensive experience in Microsoft .NET environment and some experience in J2EE environment. He has involved in a multitude of projects with a myriad of business domains.
Buddhima has extensive experience in defining IT solutions based on customer requirements. He has involved in the full development life cycle and lead System Designers, Tech Leads, Team Leads, BI Engineers, DBAs, Developers, System Engineers and QC to make sure the business requirements are delivered.
Always liaise with team and project managers to rectify issues and make sure the project is on track.
He has involved in setting up development teams with responsibilities, processes, guidelines and standards. Also involved in proposing and setting up required IT Infrastructure for teams.

Highlights: Solution analysis, Defining system architecture, Object Oriented Analysis and Design (OOAD), Agile software development, SCRUM, align teams with architecture and best practices ALM, Continuous integration, Cloud Architecture, Microservices Architecture, DevOps, Azure, Service Fabric, Kubernetes

general.headline: Software Architect at Fortunaglobal Private Limited
general.description: Software Engineer having over 10 years of experience in software industry providing robust software solutions for legendary international clients. Recognized for talents in diversified technology stack including web, middleware and mobile technologies. Adept at working with management to prioritize activities and achieve defined project objectives; able to effectively translate business requirements to technical solution. Committed to helping organizations to achieve maximum benefit through meticulous architecture, research, design and implementation of technologies.

general.headline: Senior Architect - Technology at Virtusa
general.description: Result-oriented IT Solutions Architect with 11 years of experience, in designing and delivering innovative business solutions on Java and J2EE for global banking and finance sector clients, providing leadership for strategic and governance decision making for Enterprise Architect teams and leading high-performance Research and Product Development teams.

jobs.description:
Providing thought leadership on smart automation solutions utilizing cognitive and
      
      standard automation and ensuring delivery by practicing strong engineering declines.

Robotic Process Automation solution design and implementation on WorkFusion with
      
      standard and cognitive automation for major BFS clients

Product development based on Lean Start Up methodology. Key responsibilities is to
      run Scrum based product development teams, looking in to product architecture,
      product integration architecture and overall solution architecture while keeping an eye
      
      on the user feedback.

My major engagement from April 2013 to Feb 2015 is with the Virtusa Enterprise Applications Group (EAG) playing the role of the Enterprise Architect. EAG holds responsibility and accountability all the enterprise software systems ranging from billing, accounting to employee dashboars that Virtusa uses. 

In my role as Enterprise Architect I held accountability in overall systems architecture, technical design, engineering quality, rigor and governance and end to end technical solutioning

general.headline: Chief Software Architect at hSenid | AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
general.description:
I have over 15 years of experience in IT Industry and currently working for hSenid Business Solutions as a software architect.
 
I am an expert in .net technologies including asp.net, C#,VB.net ,  web service and MVC in Visual Studio 2003 - 2013. Also I have worked as an architect under LAMP stack with PHP, Apache, MySQL, Symfony framework, Bird and open DS. I have years of experience in RDBMS in various DB platforms including MSSQL server 2000 - 2016, Orcale 9i - 12c, DB2, AS400 and MySQL.
 
I have high performed employment history including best employee, best Individual outstanding performance awards several times in carrier.

I have completed MSc. In computer science (2009 -Specialised in Software Architect) from Faculty of Engineering, University of Moratuwa and B.Sc. in Engineering (2003- Specialized in Computer Engineering) from faculty of engineering, University of Peradeniya.

I was a member of the hSenid business solutions senior management team since 2009.

jobs.description:
Involved as the software architect for HRM enterprise V8 which is a completely web based HR software solution covering wide spectrum of all HR needs and being used across 30+ countries worldwide within Single code base.
I am fully responsible with total product suite including, product architect, Database designing, Estimation, Code review, implementation etc. 
Involved in as a Security architect for above web based solution especially when it deployed as cloud solution.
I am fully responsible to implement and maintain this product as high available, DR support implementation on Singapore and Sydney amazon cloud.
